Title: Cut Throat
Plot: Monica and Vic rush to get their informants off the street after two C.I's are found brutally murdered.  Meanwhile, as Dutch and Claudette investigate a brutal beating and robbery, a case from the past forces Dutch to take one in the line of duty.  Plus, Vic suspects he's being set up when Shane comes to him after his situation with Antwon and Halpern spins out of control.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual violence and offensive language
Writer: Glen Mazzara, Randy Huggins, Jennifer R. Richmond
GuestStars: Michael Peña, Anthony Anderson, David Marciano, Stacy Meadows, Kevin Maurice Jackson, José Zúñiga, Pat Healy, Laurence Mason, Abby Brammell
